ca.ualberta.cs.corgFu

Class InsertQuestionAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
      • ca.ualberta.cs.corgFu.InsertQuestionAdapter

  • public class InsertQuestionAdapter
extends
    The custom ArrayAdapter that allows a custom view to be inserted in an android ListView. The custom view used in this case displays the question text, number of answers to the question, and the number of upvotes the question has.
    Author:
    wrflemin

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InsertQuestionAdapter(Context context, java.util.ArrayList<Question> objects)
      Builds the custom adapter that is used to insert a custom layout into the listview that shows the list of current questions.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      View getView(int position, View convertView, ViewGroup parent)
      Inserts specific elements from objects into their respective views to create a custom row in a listview.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • InsertQuestionAdapter

        public InsertQuestionAdapter(Context context,
                     java.util.ArrayList<Question> objects)
        Builds the custom adapter that is used to insert a custom layout into the listview that shows the list of current questions.
        Parameters:
        context - Information on the global application environment
        objects - The items that are going to be parsed into the custom view and displayed in a listview.

    • Method Detail

      • getView

        public View getView(int position,
           View convertView,
           ViewGroup parent)
        Inserts specific elements from objects into their respective views to create a custom row in a listview.
        Parameters:
        position - Indicates the position of the item being inserted in the list
        convertView - The view that is passed in to be recycled (if possible) to allow for fast scrolling through listviews
        parent - The listview that the element is being inserted into
